description: If you frequently find yourself exploring the deep powder of the backcountry, you should become better acquainted with the Montane. Featuring Atlas’s best-in-class tubular frame, the Reactiv™, for improved flotation and responsiveness, the Montane takes backcountry performance to new heights. Comfortable and easy to use, the all new Montane Wrapp-BC™ binding is lighter in weight and features a sleek crampon-style yoke binding helping eliminate pressure points while ensuring a secure fit. Heel and ankle strap roller buckles allow quick, easy, and intuitive access in and out of the bindings. While 19° heel lifts provide relief on ascents.
name: Montane 35 - Mens
